title: Ticket #3035: Add handlers for BOSCO file transfer commands in gridmanager
description:
Add code in gridmanager to manage and communicate with file transfer helper process that will sit beside a remote blahp.

Here is the proposed syntax for the new gahp commands:

  • Sandbox download
    • Request: DOWNLOAD_SANDBOX <req id> <sandbox id> <job ad>
    • Result: <req id> <error string> <sandbox path>
  • Sandbox upload
    • Request: UPLOAD_SANDBOX <req id> <sandbox id> <job ad>
    • Result: <req id> <error string>
  • Sandbox cleanup
    • Request: DESTROY_SANDBOX <req id> <sandbox id> <job ad>
    • Result: <req id> <error string>

<req id> is an integer unique for each command
<job ad> is a ClassAd in new ClassAd syntax
<error string> is 'NULL' for a successful command and a human-readable error message on failure
